episodes.title: Ep 41. Uriah Wesman Was In Three Cults
episodes.description: Uriah Wesman is comedian who was in three different cults growing up. In this very special episode Adam and Uriah talk about how the cult used knives to cleanse his sins, the reincarnation of Lancelot, and a lot more wild time growing up in the doomsday cult that is Church Universal and Triumphant cult Pour yourself some kool-aid. This episode is wild 🧃 Follow Uriah - https://www.instagram.com/uriahjokes/ Check out That Was Wild Live - https://www.eventbrite.com/e/that-was-wild-tickets-900765382507 Email you wild story at ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠thatwaswildpod@gmail.com⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ Follow @thatwascomedy on ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Instagram⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ / ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Tiktok⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ / ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Youtube⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠ _________________________________________________ 0:00 - Intro 1:23 - Uriah Wesman 4:36 - Writing a one person show 6:16 - Church Universal and Triumphant 11:33 - Story Telling 17:55 - "Vampire facials" at an unlicensed spa infected three people with HIV 20:28- A little girl said monsters were in her bedroom. It was 60,000 bees 22:06 - Creepy Tornado Hover board man 26:09 - Cult 1: Church Universal and Triumphant cult 43:57 - Cult 2: David Christopher Lewis 1:04:34 - Cult 3: The Ideal Society
